claims-messages.iar-required-advice: You must upload a Schedule 3 with this claim.
claims-messages.final-claim-iar-advice: You also need to complete your final report on the KTP Portal before we can make your final payment.
claims-messages.final-claim-non-iar-advice: You need to complete your final report on the KTP Portal before we can make your final payment.
claims-messages.useful-tip: Useful tip: you can use this page to upload and store all your claim support documents for this project.
claims-messages.required-upload-advice: For KTP claims, you must upload one of these claim approval documents:
claims-messages.required-upload-step-1: LMC minutes - from the local management committee (LMC) meeting where your claim was approved
claims-messages.required-upload-step-2: LMC virtual approval - an email approval saved as a PDF document or screenshot image, which clearly shows the date and time the email was sent

claim-review.additional-info-hint-query-claim: query the claim, you must explain what the partner needs to change
claim-review.additional-info-hint-submit-claim: submit the claim for approval, you can write a supporting statement to Innovate UK
claim-review.claim-review-declaration: I am satisfied that the costs claimed appear to comply with the terms and conditions of the awarded grant and eligible costs agreed by the Innovate UK Project Finance Team. This is based on evidence provided both in reports and at Local Management Committee meetings (LMC).
claim-review.monitoring-report-reminder: You must submit a monitoring report for this period before the approved claim can be paid.

claim-prepare-summary.add-comments-hint: You must write a supporting statement for your claim. All supporting information for your monitoring officer and Innovate UK must be included here.

claims-messages.iar-required: You must attach a schedule 3 to this claim.
claims-messages.final-claim-guidance:
You need to complete the following tasks before we can approve your final claim and make your last payment: 

-   upload a Schedule 3 
-   upload the LMC meeting's minutes or virtual approval
-   complete your final report

edit-page-message.intro: The knowledge base partner may vire funds between the 'Travel and subsistence' and 'Consumables' cost categories. Funds can also be vired out of these 2 categories into the 'Associate development' category. Funds cannot be vired out of the 'Associate development' category.
edit-page-message.virements: Virements are subject to approval by the Local Management Committee (LMC).
edit-page-message.requests: Requests for virements must be submitted online using the Innovation Funding Service and must be approved before the related costs are incurred. These requests must not be submitted after the project partnership has ended.

pcr-add-partner-state-aid-eligibility.guidance-non-aid-funding: This screen is not relevant to KTPs. Click save and continue.

pcr-add-partner-jes.jes-introduction: This screen is not relevant to KTPs. Click save and continue.

project-details.finance-contact-info: Only finance contacts can submit claims.
project-details.change-info: If you need to change the finance contact, please email

spend-profile-messages.cost-guidance-additional-associate-suppo:
These are the costs of managing the associate, such as computing, personnel admin, learning resources and secretarist support to the local management committee (LMC).

A full description of allowable costs can be found in the [KTP Project costs guidance (opens in a new tab)](https://www.ukri.org/councils/innovate-uk/guidance-for-applicants/costs-we-fund/costs-guidance-for-knowledge-transfer-partnerships/).
spend-profile-messages.cost-guidance-associate-development:
This supports the associate's personal and professional development.

A full description of allowable costs can be found in the [KTP Project costs guidance (opens in a new tab)](https://www.ukri.org/councils/innovate-uk/guidance-for-applicants/costs-we-fund/costs-guidance-for-knowledge-transfer-partnerships/).
spend-profile-messages.cost-guidance-associate-employment:
These are the associate's total employment costs for all projects listed in the partnership proposal, for example: salary, redundancy payments, NI and pension contributions

The business partner is solely responsible for any salary and additional employment costs that exceed the amounts recorded in this section.

The only reason you may exceed this limit is if you have added a London weighting allowance.

A full description of allowable costs can be found in the [KTP Project costs guidance (opens in a new tab)](https://www.ukri.org/councils/innovate-uk/guidance-for-applicants/costs-we-fund/costs-guidance-for-knowledge-transfer-partnerships/).
spend-profile-messages.cost-guidance-consumables:
The consumables budget is a standard contribution towards the consumable items needed to complete these projects.

A full description of allowable costs can be found in the [KTP Project costs guidance (opens in a new tab)](https://www.ukri.org/councils/innovate-uk/guidance-for-applicants/costs-we-fund/costs-guidance-for-knowledge-transfer-partnerships/).
spend-profile-messages.cost-guidance-estate:
This is usually zero because the associate is normally located at the premises of the knowledge base partner.

A full description of allowable costs can be found in the [KTP Project costs guidance (opens in a new tab)](https://www.ukri.org/councils/innovate-uk/guidance-for-applicants/costs-we-fund/costs-guidance-for-knowledge-transfer-partnerships/).
spend-profile-messages.cost-guidance-indirect-costs:
These costs are calculated automatically and paid at 100%. The calculation is 46% of the sum of 2 grant amounts: 'Associate employment costs' and the 'Academic and secretarial support costs'.

A full description of allowable costs can be found in the [KTP Project costs guidance (opens in a new tab)](https://www.ukri.org/councils/innovate-uk/guidance-for-applicants/costs-we-fund/costs-guidance-for-knowledge-transfer-partnerships/).
spend-profile-messages.cost-guidance-travel-and-subs:
Please enter separate costs for the associate and the knowledge base supervisor. Include all travel and subsistence costs needed for the proposed projects. Be specific and add each item separately.

A full description of allowable costs can be found in the [KTP Project costs guidance (opens in a new tab)](https://www.ukri.org/councils/innovate-uk/guidance-for-applicants/costs-we-fund/costs-guidance-for-knowledge-transfer-partnerships/).
spend-profile-messages.cost-guidance-default: A full description of allowable costs can be found in the [KTP Project costs guidance (opens in a new tab)](https://www.ukri.org/councils/innovate-uk/guidance-for-applicants/costs-we-fund/costs-guidance-for-knowledge-transfer-partnerships/).
spend-profile-messages.cost-guidance-other-costs:
Requests under other costs should be discussed and agreed with your nominated KTA in the first instance, with formal approval granted by the Programme Manager in relation to a request for Mentoring support costs prior to submission.

Please refer to the current guidance on eligible costs under this category as this may be subject to change

A full description of allowable costs can be found in the [KTP Project costs guidance (opens in a new tab)](https://www.ukri.org/councils/innovate-uk/guidance-for-applicants/costs-we-fund/costs-guidance-for-knowledge-transfer-partnerships/).
spend-profile-messages.cost-pre-guidance-warning-other-costs: Do not complete this section unless your Mentoring Support Costs have been approved by the Programme Manager.
spend-profile-messages.cost-pre-guidance-warning-subcontracting:
This cost category is not applicable to KTPs, and should not be completed.

A full description of allowable costs can be found in the [KTP Project costs guidance (opens in a new tab)](https://www.ukri.org/councils/innovate-uk/guidance-for-applicants/costs-we-fund/costs-guidance-for-knowledge-transfer-partnerships/).

claims-messages.guidance-message: You must upload an invoice with every claim. VAT invoices are required from partners registered for value-added tax (VAT).
claims-messages.edit-claim-line-item-other-costs-total-c: Enter your total costs on this page, (excluding VAT from your invoice if you are VAT registered).
claims-messages.edit-claim-line-item-vat-registered: If you are VAT registered you must enter all VAT from your invoice on the 'VAT' cost category page.
claims-messages.edit-claim-line-item-contact-mo: Contact your monitoring officer for more information about the level of detail you need to provide.
claims-messages.edit-claim-line-item-upload-evidence: Upload evidence of costs claimed against this cost category here.
claims-messages.edit-claim-line-item-claim-documents: Do not upload supporting documents for the whole claim here. You can upload them in the 'Claim documents' section later.
claims-messages.sbri-document-detail-guidance: Only upload evidence of costs claimed against this cost category '{{costCategoryName}}' on this page.
claims-messages.sbri-supporting-document-guidance: Do not upload supporting documents for the whole claim here. You can upload them in the 'Claim documents' section later.
claims-messages.sbri-document-advice: You need to upload the following documents here:
claims-messages.sbri-invoice-bullet-1: VAT invoices with every claim by partners registered for value-added tax (VAT)
claims-messages.sbri-invoice-bullet-2: non-VAT invoices with every claim by partners not registered for VAT
claims-messages.sbri-invoice-bullet-3: any documents requested by your monitoring officer to support a claim
claims-messages.sbri-mo-advice: Contact your monitoring officer for more information about what you need to provide.
claims-messages.milestone-contract-achievement: You need to approve costs based on the participant's achievement of the milestones listed in the contract.
claims-messages.milestone-bullet-1: approve costs for 100% of the milestone payment, if the participant has achieved all their milestones
claims-messages.milestone-bullet-2: only approve costs for the retention payment percentages specified in the contract, if the participant has partially achieved their milestones
claims-messages.milestone-bullet-3: approve costs for 0% of the milestone payment and invoice for £0, if the participant has failed to achieve their milestones
claims-messages.milestone-bullet-4: query the claim if the participant needs to make amendments

claim-review.claim-review-declaration: By pressing submit, I have satisfied myself that, based on limited sampling of financial information, and on such evidence as presented at project review meetings and in reports, the costs claimed appear commensurate with the progress reported by the project, and evidence presented is attributable to project activity.

all-claims-dashboard.sbri-guidance-message: You must upload an invoice with every claim. VAT invoices are required from partners registered for value-added tax (VAT).

edit-claim-line-items.sbri-hint-additional-information: Explain any difference between the forecast (payment schedule) costs and the total costs, including the actions you are taking as a result of the difference. For example, updating the project plan or financial forecast.

pcr-suspend-project-details.suspend-project-intro: You will not be able to perform any normal activities while this project is on hold, for example you cannot raise project change requests (PCR's), update forecasts, or submit costs.

project-details.finance-contact-info: Only finance contacts can submit drawdown requests and costs.
project-details.change-info: If you need to change the lead project manager or finance contact, please email

claims-messages.edit-claim-line-item-document-guidance: Upload evidence of the costs for your monitoring officer to review. Contact them for advice on which documents to provide.
claims-messages.edit-claim-line-item-guidance: You must break down your total costs and upload evidence for each expenditure. Contact your monitoring officer for more information about the level of detail you are required to provide.
claims-messages.edit-claim-line-item-convert-gbp: You can enter up to 120 separate lines of costs and you must convert any foreign currency amounts to pounds sterling (GBP) before you enter them.
claims-messages.nonjs-edit-claim-line-item-convert-gbp: You can enter up to 10 separate lines of costs and you must convert any foreign currency amounts to pounds sterling (GBP) before you enter them.
claims-messages.submit-claim-confirmation: I confirm that the information I have provided for this period is correct, complete and contains only eligible costs on an actual basis, which we confirm have been incurred and defrayed. I understand and accept that if I knowingly withhold information, or provide false or misleading information, this may result in funding being withdrawn, termination of the loan, recovery of loan proceeds and outstanding interest, civil action and where there is evidence of fraud, criminal prosecution.
claims-messages.claim-saved-message: You have saved your project costs.

project-labels.percentageEligibleCostsClaimedLabel: Percentage of eligible costs to date

financial-virement-labels.grant-moving-over-year: Loan value moving over the financial year end
